Package index

All functions

Add.Distance.Asso.Pattern()
Add cell-cell expr-distance interaction to a pair of cell types
Add.Expr.Asso.Pattern()
Add cell-cell expr-expr interaction pattern to a pair of cell types
Add.Spatial.Expr.Pattern()
Adds spatial differential expressed pattern (region-specific effects) to a cell type.
Est_ModelPara()
Estimate Marginal distribution and Gaussian Copula for Gene Expression Matrix
ExprDistanceTable()
Save cell expression - distance patterns for simulation
ExprExprTable()
Save cell expression - cell expression association patterns for simulation
MergeRegion()
Merge spatial and expression data from multiple regions
ParaCellsNoST()
Use parameters to simulate cell location (no existing spatial info)
ParaCellsST()
Use parameters to simulate cell location based on modeling of existing SRT
ParaDigest()
Digest the parameter file.
ParaExistingCellsST()
Use parameters to simulate cell location (direct output from existing spatial data)
ParaExpr()
Simualte gene expression data based on parameters
ParaSimulation()
(Main Function) Simulate spatially resolved transcriptomics data from a parameter file.
Pattern.Adj()
Adjust the count data for all cells in all regions based on the input spatial patterns
RandomRegionWindow()
Generate random connected region in a window
SpatialTable()
SpatialTable
Use_scDesign2()
Generate expression profile under no spatial patterns.
cell.loc.existing.fc()
Generate cell location data by using existing SRT data directly.
cell.loc.fc()
Generate cell location data from parameters.
cell.loc.model.fc()
Generate cell location data by modeling the spatial information of existing data.
cellProximityTable()
Save cell attraction and inhibition patterns for simulation
connectUp()
Assign connected regions in a window
df_to_config()
Convert a data.frame to config.yml
fit_Gaussian_copula()
Fit a Gaussian copula model for a count matrix of a single cell type
fit_model_scDesign2()
Fit models for a count matrix
fit_wo_copula()
Fit a (w/o copula) model for a count matrix of a single cell type
loadRData()
load RData with new assigned file name
multicell()
Assigns cells into spatial spots for multi-cell resolution data
preprocessGiotto()
Process SRT data using Giotto for CCI analysis.
run_interactive_sCCIgen()
Run interactive sCCIgen
sCCIgen_to_Giotto()
Convert sCCIgen output to a Giotto object
sCCIgen_to_Seurat()
Convert sCCIgen output to a Seurat object
sCCIgen_to_SpatialExperiment()
Convert sCCIgen output to a SpatialExperiment object
scDesign2.revised()
Simulate a count matrix for a single cell type
simu.window()
Simulate the window of spatial data
simulate_count_copula()
Simulate a count matrix for a single cell type based on a copula model
simulate_count_ind()
